section.heading: Dismissal of complaint.
section.text: A complaint may be dismissed on the following grounds:

para.text: The complaint is deemed to lack merit;
The complainant refuses to cooperate with the investigation; or
If, after the Executive Director refers a complaint for mediation, the complainant willfully fails to participate in good faith in the mediation process.

annotations.annotation: This section is referenced in § 5-1109, § 5-1110, and § 5-1111.
